comments.body: If someone can help with the Android part, I am willing to expose the iOS part for the next release.
iOS has just been merged and released as Ti.Map iOS 3.1.0. Android parity will be tracked in MOD-2416.
Cleaning up older fixed issues. If this issue should not have been closed as fixed, please reopen.
